name: tenant_api_key_id
description: Unique identifier for the API key

name: tenant_id
description: Tenant that owns this API key

name: tenant_api_key_hash
description: Hashed API key for secure verification

name: encrypted_tenant_api_key
description: Encrypted API key (if recovery is needed)

name: scopes
description: List of permission scopes for this API key

name: is_active
description: Whether this API key is currently active

name: created_at
description: Timestamp when API key was created

name: last_used_at
description: Timestamp of last API key usage
